nodes.text: Ghosla Fular was a Mon Calamari criminal who was serving a 30-year sentence in Sunspot Prison for forgery of local currency. Fular's profile in the New Republic prison registry was one of several that Marshal Carasynthia Dune looked at from her office on the planet Nevarro in around 9 ABY while searching for the profile of prisoner Migs Mayfeld.
Ghosla Fular appeared on a screen in "Chapter 14: The Tragedy," the sixth episode of the second season of The Mandalorian, which was released on December 4, 2020.
